definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: The academic background influences very little on the knowledge required to be a PM.
sentences.chinese: 學術背景對成爲一個項目經理所需的知識影響甚微。

sentences.english: But amid normal people these blandishments have no authority.
sentences.chinese: 不過這種甘言勸誘在普通人中影響力甚微。

sentences.english: An intraarticular corticosteroid injection was performed several months ago, with limited effect.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月以前接受膝關節內注射皮質類激素，收效甚微。

sentences.english: Two types of diffusions of the small molecules in the polymers were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 體系大小對擴散係數的計算值影響甚微。

sentences.english: When tested on nine-month-old mice, rapamycin had little effect.
sentences.chinese: 對九個月大老鼠進行試驗時，雷帕黴素作用甚微。

sentences.english: So when it comes to our actions, consciousness really just skims the surface.
sentences.chinese: 意識影響行爲，就像風掠過水麪，影響甚微。

sentences.english: We can't yet say this is too little, too late.
sentences.chinese: 我們既不能說此舉力量甚微，也不能說這爲時過晚。

sentences.english: Do you seem to drive around town a great deal but have little satisfaction?
sentences.chinese: 你是否看起來繞鎮兜了很多圈子而收郊甚微？

sentences.english: It only has a tiny effect, but enough to make the nose itchy.
sentences.chinese: 雖然反應甚微，但足以讓鼻子癢癢。

sentences.english: Thus, the eurozone-wide gains from European bonds are likely to be negligible.
sentences.chinese: 於是，整個歐元區從歐洲債券中很可能獲益甚微。

sentences.english: They deviated little from the scholastics in tackling the standard problems.
sentences.chinese: 他們在處理典型問題時和經院派學究相差甚微。

sentences.english: The stirring with center pipe and flocculate has little effect to the effluent turbidity.
sentences.chinese: 中心管加攪拌以及攪拌絮凝對出水濁度影響甚微。

sentences.english: They point out the thct that it cost billions of dollars to can3' on the space research, but a little infrmation was brought back.
sentences.chinese: 他們指出，數百億美元用於太空研究，但收穫甚微。

sentences.english: External circumstances matter very little. Very little.
Decades later, he sees the fraudulence in that discretion.
sentences.chinese: 幾十年過去了，他才瞭解謹小甚微的背後是自我欺騙。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
lit. set up a pole and see the shadow (idiom); fig. instant effect/quick results
to give a discount/to be of less value than anticipated
to work hard while accomplishing little/to toil to no avail
needless to say/it goes without saying
